structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: A violation of KRS 71.020 shall constitute a misfeasance in office and the District Court may fine the jailer or he may be indicted therefor.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 59, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2229.
